CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART TWELVE - PLANNING AND ZONING CODE

TITLE SIX - Zoning

CHAPTER 1280 Site Plan Review

1280.01 TITLE.

1280.02 SITE PLAN REQUIRED.

1280.03 SUBMISSION OF SITE PLAN.

1280.04 SITE PLAN CONTENTS.

1280.05 SUPPLEMENTING OR ELIMINATING REQUIREMENTS.

1280.06 STAFF REVIEW.

1280.07 SITE PLAN REVIEW CRITERIA APPLICABLE TO ALL LAND USES.

1280.08 SITE PLAN REVIEW CRITERIA APPLICABLE TO PARTICULAR LAND USES.

1280.09 MODIFICATION OF PLAN UNDER REVIEW.

1280.10 APPROVAL OR DISAPPROVAL.

1280.11 EXTERIOR FACADE DESIGN STANDARDS.

1280.12 CONTROL OF ISSUANCE OF BUILDING PERMITS, ETC.; RESTRICTION OF USES.

1280.13 SITE PLAN AS CONDITION OF ZONING CERTIFICATE AND CONTINUATION OF USE.

1280.14 MODIFICATION OF APPROVED SITE PLAN.

1280.15 EXEMPTIONS.

1280.16 ADMINISTRATIVE RULES AUTHORIZED.

1280.17 BURDEN OF PROOF; STANDARD OF PROOF.

1280.18 EXPIRATION OF APPROVALS.
